script.value: Transitivity in property hierarchies lint; ?x:OBJECTPROPERTY, ?y:OBJECTPROPERTY SELECT ?y subPropertyOf ?x, Transitive ?y, Transitive ?x WHERE ?x!= ?y BEGIN REMOVE Transitive ?y END; RETURN ?y; Transitive property ?y is also a sub-property of the Trasitive property ?x; Lint that corrects the undesirable situation in which a transitive object property is sub-property of another transitive object property
